13. 2.000beta6c

Enhancements | Fixes | Incompatibilities

13.1. Enhancements

A template directory has been added. This contains skeleton SDF files for different document types.

Prefilters now have their own subdirectory under lib.

13.2. Fixes

None.

13.3. Incompatibilities

None.
